name: Testy
description: Testy is an open-source, Java-based framework designed for Automated Acceptance Testing of web applications using the Selenium WebDriver library. It provides a robust and structured approach to creating UI tests, making them more stable and easier to maintain. A primary feature of Testy is its ability to simplify element location, allowing users to define elements using simple properties instead of complex XPATH or CSS selectors. The framework is specifically optimized for testing applications with dynamic HTML and complex user interfaces, such as those built with ExtJS and Bootstrap. By offering high-level abstractions like WebLocator and Table, Testy significantly lowers the effort required to implement reliable automated testing solutions.

name: Automation example
description: An example project for automating web testing using Selenium.
